title: The S-Classes That I Raised - Novel Updates
genre: Action   Adventure   Comedy   Drama   Fantasy   Supernatural
tags: Adapted to Manhwa   Age Regression   Aggressive Characters   Alternate World   Artifacts   Brother Complex   Brotherhood   Celebrities   Cheats   Childcare   Dungeons   Familial Love   Family   Fearless Protagonist   Friendship   Game Elements   Guilds   Hard-Working Protagonist   Hidden Abilities   Hiding True Abilities   Hunters   Level System   Loyal Subordinates   Male Protagonist   Male Yandere   Misunderstandings   Modern Day   Monster Tamer   Monsters   Obsessive Love   Orphans   Overprotective Siblings   Pets   Possessive Characters   Racism   Sadistic Characters   Second Chance   Special Abilities   Strength-based Social Hierarchy   Sudden Strength Gain   Time Travel   Weak Protagonist   Yandere
author: Geunseo   근서
description:
He was an F-rank Hunter. To top it off, he was a useless F-rank loser of a big brother who dragged down his incredible younger brother.

While he carelessly lived out his messed-up life, he ultimately took his younger brother’s life. 

He regressed back in time with the title, Perfect Caregiver.

“Okay, this time, let’s lay low and take care of the talented ones instead.” He thought.

But those S-ranks are acting a little strange.
>
